overview.summary: The module changes/recreates right-hand side (RHS) for Finite Elements discretization approach due to source current dipoles

description.p: The module has the following behaviour:

listitem.p: When the module doesn't find ColumnMatrix on its imput containing RHS to modify or the ColumnMatrix found is of size different than the number of nodes in the mesh, it creates new ColumnMatrix and fills it in correspondence with supplied mesh and dipole parameters

The supplied mesh is assumed to be of type TetVolField(int) containing indices to conductivity tensor lookup table. Further requirements to the supplied mesh are described in documentation to BioPSE::Forward::SetupFEMatrix module
Dipoles are represented as nodes in TetVolMesh. The corresponding value are vectors representing dipole moments. So the module expects dipoles as TetVolField(Vector) field

description.p: Takes handle to the field containing condictivity mesh
Takes handle to the field containing dipole positions and their moment values
Maps electrode indices to mesh indices
Takes handle to the matrix containing RHS for FE discretization obtained from SetupFEMatrix
Sends handle to Matrix containing dipole terms to downstream modules
